name: RA "The Awakening" CD
description:
RA "The Awakening"
The Awakening is the bone crushing debut album from the Merrimack Valley's,  own RA! This EP has 5 new heavy hardcore  tracks and two rerecorded classics from the demo. This recording has guest spots from Chris Linkovich from Cruel Hand and Sweet Pete from In My Eyes. With Artwork by Rafal Wechterowicz, pre production with Ryan Stack and recording,mixing, and mastering from Dean Baltulonis this is sure to be the best hardcore EP of 2012. Come May 15, everyone will hear why this is one of the most anticipated albums of the year.  This is AR#038.
 
Track Listing
1. Bound By Chains
2. Dealbreaker
3. Untamed World
4. Chewed Up & Spit Out
5. Erosion
6. Thorn In My Side
7. The Awakening

name: Negative Approach "Nothing Will Stand In Our Way" 12"
description: Limited green vinyl! This Collection of early recordings from seminal Detroit hardcore band whose songs have been covered by Agnostic Front, Madball, AFI, Hatebreed, and many others. Features outtakes and live recordings that preceded their classic Tied Down LP [1982]. THIS ALBUM HAS 53 SONGS ON IT!!!!

name: The Bruisers "Independence Day" 12"
description:
Rock n Roll Disgrace is proud to (finally) bring you the highly anticipated: THE BRUISERS - INDEPENDENCE DAY on vinyl for the first time. A true landmark release in American Oi! - this album changed the game and helped to define early 90s US Oi!

We are talking about a true classic that is an essential for any vinyl Oi! collector. This release contains our favorite Bruisers material and sounds unbelievable on vinyl.

You can finally put away the creaky cassette you bought in 1990 (or on eBay last year). This highly limited release (it was cassette-only, 22 years ago!) has been reissued on CD a few times and hidden away on compilations. We felt that needed to be rectified and given a release worthy of it's legacy.

A true labor of love for the RRD crew, this has been in the works for 2+ years and now we are happy to finally bring it to you the way it was meant to be released: on a hefty 12" platter of certified maximum USA Oi!

Pressing Info:

Embossed Cover 
100 Clear Vinyl w/ Poster (**Mailorder Only) - SOLD OUT 
200 Blue Translucent Vinyl 
200 Red Translucent Vinyl 
200 White Vinyl 
300 Black

name: Vice "Flawed" 7"
description:
Artist: Vice 
Title: flawed 
Format: 60 gram 7" color vinyl w/ DL card 
Label: Frequency Deleted Records 
Catalog: FDR#036V 
Song titles: 
Side a 
 -since birth 
 -every future is flawed 
 -not in with the out-crowd 
Side b 
 -leave 
 -last of the try hards 
For fans of : Revenge, Product of waste and Shoot To Kill

Formed in Staten Island, NY, Vice is a 4 piece hardcore band who combines many styles into one and brings you a fast, pissed off, and heavy sound. With a strong DIY ethic they intend to never stop working, releasing, and touring. After touring relentlessly for the past year all over the U.S. on one album, they will release a new EP entitled "Flawed" on Frequency Deleted Records. The record is a very different style of power violence influenced hardcore that is focused mainly on the message. Fed up with and disgusted by just about everything, Flawed is 5 tracks of non stop hatred.

Members: Andrew- Vocals James- Bass Dom- Guitar Alex- Drums

 *Save on shipping with the 3 pack special while it lasts!

name: Alpha & Omega "No Rest No Peace" 12"
description:
No Rest, No Peace, the first full-length in nearly three years from L.A.'s Alpha & Omega, is a juggernaut that, as Punknews.org put it, acts as "the mid-point between Integrity, Cro-Mags, and a police chase." Produced by New Found Glory's Chad Gilbert (H2O, Terror, Trapped Under Ice) and recorded by Kyle Black (Shai Hulud), No Rest, No Peace blasts through 10 tidy cuts of thrash-tinged metallic hardcore.

 The LP includes a fold-out 18" x 24" insert poster.

Track listing:
 1. Sink
 2. No Rest, No Peace
 3. Burning Rope
 4. Underworld
 5. Counterfeit,
 6. Downfall
 7. Chains of Life
 8. Questions & Devils
 9. Lost My Way
 10. Choking Tongue

Opaque Yellow w/ Heavy Black Splatter/500)

name: Nervous Impulse "S/T" 12"
description: Nervous Impulse from DC play their own brand of fast hardcore punk in the vein of bands like Bad Brains, Dead Kennedys, and Minor Threat. This record will take you back to the pure fury of 80's hardcore, while somehow keeping both feet firmly planted in the now. NI features ex/current members of Striking Distance, The Goons, HR Band and more. The first Bridge Nine pressing of this S/T 8 song EP is limited to 500 copies on yellow vinyl.

This variant is on white vinyl and limited to 600 copies.

This 2xLP is packed with extra content featuring Ill Blood on the first LP, the S/T 7" + Demo on the second LP, and an etched D side illustrated by Damian Abraham from Fucked up. 21 songs total! All of this is housed in a heavy duty full color gatefold jacket. This variant is on "blood and shit" colored vinyl and is limited to 1,000 copies.

name: One H.E.L.L. of a compilation (2xLP) limited/500
description:
In 2007, Gordon Riker & Kelly Wallace both tragically passed away in bike accidents in Boston, MA. Shortly after, friends of their's started a non-profit organization titled H.E.L.L. (Helping Everyone Live Longer). H.E.L.L. is a DIY group that primarily operates in Boston's punk and hardcore scene that both Gordon and Kelly were heavily involved in. H.E.L.L.'s main goal is to give out free helmets from donations while raising bike safety awareness.
This compilation features songs and artwork from Gordon and Kelly's friends, family, and favorite bands, as well as a few others who have lost someone close to them. Contributions are not just primarily from the Greater Boston area, but also Florida, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, New York, Vermont, Pennsylvania, and Quebec. All proceeds from this compilation will go directly to helping keep H.E.L.L. alive.
Side A 
-------- 
01. 108 - Into Her Arms 
02. Attica! Attica! - You, The Music, and Me 
03. Brian Marquis - '84 Rookie Card 
04. Jason Anderson - Don't Give Up Just Yet 
05. Battle! - Brick 
06. Alanna - Surprise, You're Alive 
07. Converge - On My Shield
Side B 
-------- 
01. Give and Take - Hope is Lost 
02. Form & File - Mundane Pleasures 
03. Oscar Albis Rodriguez - My Dear Rachel 
04. Fly Upright Kite - You Shine 
05. Foxfires - Nostrum 
06. The Faux - Biology =/= Destiny 
07. The First Annual - Like We Used To Do
Side C 
-------- 
01. Hunger - Punishment 
02. Our Lives - Fortunate Son 
03. Late Nite Wars - Bones (acoustic) 
04. Powerwolves - No God, Know Peace 
05. Peter Long - Huntington Towards Newbury 
06. Life & Limb - named must your fear be before banish it you can 
07. Paint it Black - Bliss
Side D 
-------- 
01. Roadrage - North Star 
02. Ten Thirty Nine - Edward Morgan Forster 
03. yellowbirddd - lionize 
04. Wrong Body - Warning! (Signs!) 
05. Vanna - Every Bridge 
06. Valencourt - Mapping Out The Miles 
07. Therefore I Am - Big Blue
LP orders will also receive a digital download card (with their records) for the full 71 song digital compilation. The tracklist for this is at http://onehellofacompilation.bandcamp.com
Pressing Info: 
Black - limited to 55 copies, record release color with a spray painted/hand numbered insert. 
White - limited to 159 copies 
Black/purple marble - limited to 304 copies,

name: Cock Sparrer "True Grit Outtakes" 180 gram 12"
description: Remixed and remastered, this foil-stamped gem includes all of the tracks that were recorded for their debut with Decca, only un-cut, with all the count-ins and banter in between. This record is like a snapshot of being in the studio with CockSParrer, during the VERY early days. As it would be with such an amazing band, many of these songs have held strong through decades of new music and continue to reign as many of the "hits" they still perform today. To hear those songs at their roots is special, and we felt that this record deserved equally special packaging to commemorate how legendary it is to leagues of fans and vinyl collectors alike.

options.name: Foil stamped standard 12" TRI-COLOR -180 black,white & red VINYL LTD 500

name: Energy "Punch The Clock" CD
description:
Energy's debut E.P. "Punch The Clock" is finally available again after being out of print since 2007...and it's only FIVE BUCKS!

Remastered on CD with 11 bonus tracks, this reissue includes:

- Original 7 song E.P.
- Original 2 song demo from 2006

- Brand new re-recording of the song "Keep The Change"
- Brand new inner sleeve featuring artwork by Bill Hauser

"Punch The Clock" was recorded at "The Outpost" in Energy's hometown of Stoughton, MA where many great bands from Boston have recorded before them (Dropkick Murphys, Darkbuster, Blood For Blood, etc.).

To proceed to our website, go to: http://energy.bandcamp.com

Track Listing

2. Keep The Change
3. Lost And Found
4. Streetlights

7. Bushwacked

description:

No 8 Track player? No problem. With each purchase of this gem you will recieve a burnt CD with the live album so you can listen to it in your car in 2011. This is Welfare Records  #044.

name: Word For Word "Manchester Forever" CD
description:
Manchester Forever " is the sophomore full length CD from Word For Word consisting of once vinyl only songs, the brand new "Courage Over Fear" EP, unreleased material, and a couple of classic covers! This CD consists of 13 tracks.

tracks 1-3 from the "Keepsake" LP
1.Isolation
2.Scumbag
3.Lucky
4.Breaking All the Rules(previously unreleased version from the Keepsake recording sessions)
tracks 5-9 from the "Courage Over Fear" EP
5. Courage Over Fear
6. I Still Hate You
7. Free The Devil(featuring Jim Death from Hammer Bros)
8. Forget About It
9. Trainwreck
tracks 10- 13 from the split 7' with Doggfight U.S sessions
10. Blood Letter(Return To Sender)
11. It's The Limit* By the Cro-Mags!(previously unreleased)
12. Crucified* By Iron Cross
13. secret track... you gotta buy this CD to find out!

this product is arrest record #008

name: Word For Word "Keepsake" CD
description:
This is Frequency Deleted Records #011

Manchester, New Hampshire's Word For Word bring a style of hardcore that is at the same time heavy, melodic and street smart, bringing together the best of bands like H2O, Ten Yard Fight, Sheer Terror and Integrity. Now also available on vinyl and iTunes. Vinyl has 3 bonus tracks!

Track Listing: 
1. March Of The Skinheads 
2. Out Of Time 
3. Word For Word 
4. Poisoned 
5. Defend Manchester 
6. Bounce 
7. If Suffer We Must 
8. Ides Of March 
9. Five Six Six 
10. Keepsake
